name: incongruent
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
formal not suitable or not fitting well with something else: incongruent with Violence is incongruent with our values and legal system.
mathematics
  specialized used to describe a shape in mathematics that does not have the same shape and size as another: incongruent triangles
